items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: Interactive Terminal Portfolio An interactive, terminal-style portfolio designed for showcasing experience and skills tailored for DevOps and SRE roles. This project replicates a lightweight Linux terminal interface, allowing recruiters to engage with your resume dynamically using real terminal-like commands.
